sentences.en: Et il lui donna un premier coup de hache.
sentences.cn: 说完,他就向树干砍了过去.

sentences.en: He has acquired a reputation as this country's premier solo violinist.
sentences.cn: 他已经赢得了该国首席小提琴独奏家的名誉。

sentences.en: His work on the causes of diseases is of premier importance to the whole world.
sentences.cn: 他对病因的研究对整个世界来说非常重要.
都柏林最好的酒店之一

sentences.en: Ritz Carlton is one of the world's premier hotel chains.
sentences.cn: 里兹·卡尔顿酒店是世界顶级的连锁酒店之一.
她就读于英国最好的大学.

sentences.en: She has a high reputation in France as Premier of Britain.
sentences.cn: 她这个英国首相在法国声望很高.

sentences.en: The canny Premier covered his back by pointing out that he was of Scottish stock.
sentences.cn: 精明狡猾的首相辩解说自己是苏格兰血统。

sentences.en: The Chinese delegation was headed by Vice Premier Wang Qishan.
sentences.cn: 双方已经具有庞大和不断增进的贸易关系.

sentences.en: The club are on the brink of promotion to the Premier League.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部即将晋级超级联赛。

sentences.en: The company has achieved a premier position in the electronics field.
sentences.cn: 该公司执电子行业之牛耳.

sentences.en: The crowd cheered as Premier Wayne Goss unveiled a lifesize statue of poet Banjo Paterson.
sentences.cn: 韦恩·戈斯州长揭开诗人巴尼奥·佩特森的等身塑像时，人群欢呼起来。

sentences.en: The premier occupies the foremost place in the world of politics.
sentences.cn: 首相是政界的首要人物.

sentences.en: The Premier's bodyguard was [ were ] waiting there.
sentences.cn: 首相的 护卫 人员在那儿等着.

sentences.en: They're ready to go all out for the Premier League title next season.
sentences.cn: 他们准备全力以赴，夺取下赛季的超级联赛冠军。

sentences.en: This particular name originated with an emperor and a premier.
sentences.cn: “皇城相府”这个名字的来历,和一位皇帝、一位丞相有关.

words.tran_cn: 总理职位与任期；首相之职位与任期

trans.tran_cn: 第一的，首位的，首要的，最先的，最早的

trans.tran_en: a  prime minister  – used in news reports
